AppFooter.tagline: The Global Agricultural Supply Chain Platform.

Auth.signInDescription: Enter your credentials to access your dashboard.
Auth.recoverWithUniversalIdPrompt: Or Recover Account with Universal ID
Auth.signUpDescription: Start your journey in the digital agricultural ecosystem.
Auth.namePlaceholder: e.g., Jane Doe or Green Valley Farms
Auth.rolePlaceholder: Select your main role in the supply chain
Auth.forgotPasswordResetPrompt: Regain access to your DamDoh account.
Auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
Auth.resetPasswordPrompt: Set a new password for your DamDoh account.
Auth.resetPasswordDescription: Choose a new, strong password for your account.

recoverPage.title: Account Recovery
recoverPage.description: Recover your account using social verification from a trusted friend on DamDoh.
recoverPage.step1: Enter the phone number of the account you want to recover.
recoverPage.step2: Show the temporary QR code on your screen to a trusted friend who is also a DamDoh user.
recoverPage.step3: Your friend scans the code to confirm your identity, granting you access on this new device.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Let a trusted DamDoh connection scan this temporary QR code to verify your identity.
recoverPage.scanNote: This code is valid for 10 minutes.

GroupsPage.title: Community Groups
GroupsPage.description: Join groups based on your interests to connect with like-minded people.

toast.loginToJoin: Please log in to join a group.

detail.beTheFirst: Be the first to start a conversation in this group!

create.title: Create a New Group
create.description: Bring people together around a common interest.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of what this group is about.
form.publicLabel: Public Group (anyone can see and join)

auth.title: Authentication Required

postDetail.noReplies: No replies yet. Be the first to respond!

toast.emptyReply: Please write a reply before submitting.

networkPage.title: Grow Your Network
networkPage.description: Connect with farmers, buyers, experts, and organizations to expand your reach.

networkPage.noStakeholdersFound: No stakeholders found matching your criteria.

CreatePostModal.title: Create a new post
CreatePostModal.description: Compose and share an update with the community. You can add text, media, or create a poll.
CreatePostModal.placeholder: What agricultural insights or news do you want to share?
CreatePostModal.pollNote: Max {maxOptions} options. Each option max 80 characters.
CreatePostModal.emptyPostError: Please add some content, an image, or a valid poll to your post.

DashboardRightSidebar.adTitle: Stay ahead with DamDoh Market Trends!
DashboardRightSidebar.adDescription: Get exclusive insights on commodity prices and supply chain dynamics.
DashboardRightSidebar.signInPrompt: Sign in to get personalized suggestions.
DashboardRightSidebar.loadError: Failed to load suggestions. Please try again.
DashboardRightSidebar.noSuggestions: No new suggestions at the moment.
DashboardRightSidebar.infoTooltip: These suggestions are AI-powered based on your role, interests, and activity on the platform.

page.title: Upcoming Agricultural Events
page.description: Discover workshops, conferences, and webinars in the agricultural world.
page.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, location, or topic...
page.noEventsHint: There are currently no events matching your criteria. Why not <link>create one</link>?
page.couldNotFetchEvents: Could not fetch the list of events. Please try again later.

pinned.title: Homepage Pinned!
pinned.description: The Agri-Events page is now your default homepage.

unpinned.title: Homepage Unpinned!
unpinned.description: The Dashboard is now your default homepage.

create.formDescription: Fill in the details below to list your event on the platform.
create.authErrorDescription: You must be signed in to create an event.
create.uploadingDescription: Please wait while your event image is being uploaded.
create.successDescription: Your event '{title}' has been successfully listed.
create.failDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
create.successCardDescription: It is now visible to the entire DamDoh community. What would you like to do next?
create.linkCopiedDescription: The event link has been copied to your clipboard.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide a detailed description of your event, including speakers, topics, and schedule.
form.locationDescription: Enter a physical location or specify 'Online' for virtual events.
form.enableRegDescription: Allow users to register for this event directly through DamDoh.
form.priceDescription: Leave as 0 for a free event.
form.imageUrlDescription: Link to a promotional image or banner for your event.

share.title: Share Event
share.description: Share this event with your network.

registration.notAvailable: Registration for this event is not available through DamDoh.
registration.successDescription: You are now registered for the event.
registration.discountApplied: A coupon was applied for a discount of {amount} {currency}.

coupon.toastDescription: The coupon code '{couponCode}' has been added to your registration.
coupon.label: Have a coupon code?
coupon.note: The discount will be applied at the final step.

ticket.title: Your Event Ticket
ticket.scan: Present this QR code at the event for check-in.

notFound.title: Event Not Found
notFound.description: The event you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.

errors.loadDescription: Could not fetch the event details. Please try again.
errors.signInDescription: You must be signed in to register for an event.

checkin.title: Attendee Check-in
checkin.description: Scan attendee's unique event ticket QR code to check them into the event.

error.invalidCode: Invalid QR Code: Not a DamDoh check-in code.
error.wrongEvent: This ticket is for a different event.
error.noUserId: Invalid QR Code: No User ID found.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred during check-in.
error.failUnknown: Check-in failed for an unknown reason.

scanFail.title: Scan Failed
scanFail.description: Could not read the QR code. Please try again.

staff.title: Manage Event Staff
staff.description: Add or remove staff who can help you check-in attendees.
staff.searchPlaceholder: Search user by name or email...

toast.searchLengthError: Please enter at least 3 characters to search.

attendees.title: Event Attendees
attendees.description: View the list of all registered attendees for your event.
attendees.noAttendees: No one has registered for this event yet.

create.title: Create New Coupon
create.description: Generate discount codes to promote your event.

list.title: Existing Coupons
list.description: View and manage your active and past coupons.
list.toastDescription: A shareable link with the coupon has been copied: {link}

shareModal.title: Share Coupon
shareModal.description: Share this code or link with potential attendees.

hero.title: Connect. Transact. Grow. The {appName} Advantage.
hero.subtitle: The global platform empowering every stakeholder in the agricultural supply chain, from farmers and co-ops to logistics providers and global buyers.

features.title: Engineered for the Entire Ecosystem
features.subtitle: DamDoh provides tailored tools and connections for every stage of the agricultural value chain.

networking.title: Intelligent Networking
networking.description: Connect with the right partners, from local suppliers to international buyers, based on your specific needs and role.

marketplace.title: Global Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell products, equipment, and services securely in a transparent, global marketplace.

forums.title: Knowledge Sharing
forums.description: Join topic-specific forums to share insights, ask questions, and learn from experts around the world.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Find skilled professionals or offer your expertise for short-term or long-term agricultural projects.

forWho.title: A Platform for Every Player
forWho.description: Whether you're in the field or the office, DamDoh has the tools you need to succeed.

farmers.title: Farmers & Co-ops
farmers.description: Manage your farm, track produce from seed to sale, and access broader markets.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Find reliable, traceable products directly from the source and manage your supply chain efficiently.

experts.title: Service Providers & Experts
experts.description: Offer your services, from agronomy and logistics to finance, to a targeted agricultural audience.

cta.title: Ready to Transform How You Work?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of agricultural professionals building trust, transparency, and growth in the global supply chain.

hub.title: Farm Management Hub
hub.description: Your central place for all farming operations. Manage your farms, crops, inputs, and financials, all in one place.

myFarms.title: My Farms
myFarms.description: View, edit, or add your farm properties.

labor.title: Labor Management
labor.description: Keep track of worker hours, payments, and tasks.

knf.title: KNF Inputs
knf.description: Create and manage your Korean Natural Farming batches.

fgw.title: Farming God's Way Guide
fgw.description: Explore principles and practices of FGW.

financials.title: Farm Financials
financials.description: Track income and expenses to understand profitability.

seedStarting.title: Seed Starting Guide
seedStarting.description: Learn how to start seeds indoors successfully.

familyFarm.title: Integrated Family Farm Model
familyFarm.description: Discover a sustainable model for small-scale farms.

assetManagement.title: Asset Management
assetManagement.description: Manage your equipment, buildings, and other assets. (Coming Soon)

myFarms.title: My Farms
myFarms.noFarmsDescription: Add your first farm to start managing your agricultural operations.
